TunableTuple.name: value
TunableTuple.description: Tunable mapping between animation actors and ParticipantTypes.

TunableVariant.name: carry_target
TunableVariant.description: This must be specified for any interaction that involves carrying an object. The ParticipantType specified here will be used to find the participant in this interaction to set to the carry_target.

TunableVariant.name: target_override
TunableVariant.description: If specified, we will attempt to set this interaction's target to the actor that matches the ParticipantType specified here.
